scenarios.title: Setting Boundaries After a Busy Week

acts.title: Act 1 — Tension
steps: You’ve both had a long week. Messages were short and a bit snappy.
You: 'I’m exhausted, can we pick a calmer time?'

acts.title: Act 2 — Reflection
steps: You suggest taking a short walk before talking.
Partner: 'Okay… I guess I could use some fresh air too.'

acts.title: Act 3 — Conversation
steps: You: 'When texts get short, I feel distance. I need clarity, not guesswork.'
Partner: 'I get overwhelmed and shut down. I don’t want that to push you away.'

acts.title: Act 4 — Agreement
steps: You agree on a 'pause signal' when messages get tense and to revisit later.
Both: 'We’ll check in tomorrow to see how it felt.'

acts.title: Act 2 — Discovery
steps: You look up options that blend both moods.
Partner: 'There’s a bistro with an acoustic set.'

acts.title: Act 3 — Decision
steps: You: 'Let’s try the bistro — talk first, then music.'
